Data Toolbox

Initially based on a list by Prof. Bahareh Heravi, with some additions from me. You can find a list of even more tools on SPJ Toolbox.

Collection

  • Web Scraper â€” browser plugin for scraping
  • Outwit Hub â€” desktop app for scraping
  • Parsehub â€” desktop app for scraping
  • Visualping â€” monitor website changes
  • Tabula â€” get data from PDFs
  • WebPlotDigitize â€” digitise image charts
  • Map Digitizer â€” digitise image maps
  • IFTTT â€” automate tasks
  • NodeXL â€” network analysis
  • Media Cloud â€” media analysis
  • R / rvest â€” programming language
  • Python / beautifulsoup â€” programming language
  • Selenium â€” browser automation
  • curl converter â€” convert curl commands to Python, JS, R, etc.
  • SelectorGadget â€” CSS selector helper
  • data.page â€” JSON to CSV converter
  • SVG crowbar â€” lift SVG off of webpages

FOIA

  • FOIA Wiki â€” FOIA resources (US-focused)
  • Data Liberation Project â€” released government datasets
  • WhatDoTheyKnow â€” FOIA tool and catalogue

Wrangling

  • Microsoft Excel â€” desktop spreadsheets app
  • Google Sheets â€” free spreadsheets web app
  • OpenRefine â€” data cleaning and transformation (R implementation)
  • Parserator â€” parse addresses and other unstructured text
  • Geocodio â€” geocode ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡¦ addresses

Analysis

  • Microsoft Excel â€” desktop spreadsheets app
  • Google Sheets â€” free spreadsheets web app
  • R / rvest â€” programming language
  • Python / beautifulsoup â€” programming language
  • SPSS â€” statistical analysis software
  • PSPP â€” statistical analysis software
  • Tableau (paid) â€” data analysis and visualisation tool
  • QGIS â€” desktop mapping software
  • CARTO â€” web mapping software

Visualisation

  • Datawrapper â€” web dataviz tool
  • Flourish â€” web interactive/dataviz tool
  • RAW Graphs â€” static chart maker
  • Infogram â€” infographic creator
  • Datamatic.io â€” web dataviz tool
  • Highcharts â€” chart library for developers
  • Plotly â€” chart library for developers
  • D3.js â€” library for advanced dataviz
  • Mapbox â€” map maker
  • Mapshaper â€” editor for map data
  • geojson.io â€” editor for map data
  • Gephi â€” network visualisations
  • R / ggplot2 â€” programming language

Colours

  • ColorBrewer â€” collection of safe colour palettes
  • Chroma.js â€” colour palette helper
  • Scientific Colour Maps â€” colour-blind and accurate colour palette
